application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 3a (submission of details - (a) New architectural features including doors, architraves, skirtings, cornices, panelling and fireplaces which do not form part of the works approved under listed building consent reference LB/23/2938 (dated 18/9/2023), at a scale of 1:10, including a section) of listed building consent 23/08444 (Internal alterations and refurbishment to include replacement of stone floors to basement and entrance hall; alteration to basement entry and staff accommodation; alterations to family room on ground floor and reinstatement of fireplace to study; refurbishment and alteration of bathrooms and dressing room; reinstatement of part of ceiling to third floor room; formation of a bathroom at attic level.)
